EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Your Interest, {!OnlineApplication__c.Application_Title__c} Instructions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!OnlineApplication__c.Contact_Name__c},
Thank you for your interest in the CarsArrive OTR fleet card. Attached with this email is a document detailing the features and benefits of our program. If you would like to speak with a representative about how a CarsArrive OTR fleet card can benefit you, please dial 866.457.2277.
For your convenience, I've also attached a link to our online application which you may complete when the time best fits your schedule. Please click on this link and follow the instructions to complete your application process.
We look forward to a long relationship with {!OnlineApplication__c.Legal_Business_Name__c}. And again, thank you for your interest in CarsArrive. If you have any questions about the application or your new fuel card program, please call 866.457.2277.
